title: LeBlanc now has one less counter.

replies.body: rip my 10 X 10 damage
It hits 10 times.

> [{quoted}](name=Cameron2325,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7BOErGqH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-11T09:21:18.852+0000)
>
> rip my 10 X 10 damage

it's also amplified by up to 50% depending on missing health so it's a significant amount

you people are complaining WAY to much about this morg "nerf". Ive said it once and ill say it again, this is will make it so the good morgana players can play her and feel good about it. Now all the bad morg players will scuttle off and QQ about it
What happened to Morg?

Her base tormented soil damage was decreased dramatically. The tiniest bit of MR and it does practically nothing, but the biggest issue is her waveclear is garbage now. It evens out at rank 5 but the only strength of Morg is having safe early game waveclear and doing tons of damage and utility later.

> [{quoted}](name=FistOfSharkiesha,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7BOErGqH,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-05-11T19:27:30.735+0000)
>
> Her base tormented soil damage was decreased dramatically. The tiniest bit of MR and it does practically nothing, but the biggest issue is her waveclear is garbage now. It evens out at rank 5 but the only strength of Morg is having safe early game waveclear and doing tons of damage and utility later.

yup

now you're going to get shoved in and you won't be able to cs at all because the tower will steal all your creep kills
So this is just another mage/support being forced to support where they can hardly compete with Leona Thresh and Nautilus. At this point Annie is better at support and mid than most supports or mids.
Don't worry... Galio and Mordekaiser have mid lane under control.
Guys just use Galio to counter Leblanc she deals no damage if you bulwark it.
I never heard she actually has any counters..

> [{quoted}](name=PiVoRx,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7BOErGqH,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-11T13:36:05.708+0000)
>
> I never heard she actually has any counters..

morgana absolutely slaughters leblanc both in lane and after lane

> [{quoted}](name=PiVoRx,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7BOErGqH,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-11T13:36:05.708+0000)
>
> I never heard she actually has any counters..

http://champion.gg/champion/Leblanc/Middle

Bottom left for her counters at high elo on the current patch.

Take those with a grain of salt, there are some champions that are just flat out good or bad in every patch. Like, right now it says everyone counters Ryze mid, where it's just people haven't learned how to play him on top of the fact that he might be under tuned.
Diana. I wreck LB every time.
Rip my only midlaner. Guess I'm a bot lane main now, sigh
You can still mid lane morg. Not all LB's are crazy good, and their are other champs Morg is good against.

Lol yea, just more difficult now. Good thing Morgana is easy to play, lol

It's mostly that she's getting nerfed this patch, plus OPs joke that she's getting gutted since Pawn just played mid Morgana, and EDG beat Fakers LeBlanc, which was his first professional loss on her.
Yeah I hate that too, because I like breaking her out every once in awhile on mid. I main Diana and Katarina so I don't play Morg much.

Actually i discovered that Veigar is a really nice counter too: it might sound crazy, but since his stun stops dashes it gains an absurd utility and can trap really bad Leb, only it needs to be rethinked and not played like his older version.

That or i just defeated a really noob Leb, but it does not seemed the only factor... food for thought.
